Package SecureAuthServer.SecureAuthServer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SecurityAutomaton
    This interface is to be implemented by the classes defining a State Machine (Security Automaton).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    Sample Driver for authorization server
    cborConverter
    This class is used for encoding some data as CBOR and vice versa.
    CoapConfirmationResource  
    CoapFlushResource
    This class represents the resource which performs garbage collection initiated by the resource servers.
    CoapHcapParentResource
    This class is the represents the parent resource of all the default resources part of HCAP protocol.
    CoapIssueLostResource
    This class represents the resource used by the client to recover a lost certificate.
    CoapIssueNewResource
    This class represents the resource used by the client to obtain a new capability.
    CoapPingResource
    This class represents the HCAP Ping resource.
    CoapResetResource
    This class represents the resource used to reset the reset the authorization server.
    CoapUpdateResource
    This class represents the resource used to update authorization server state using the state update request sent by the client.
    CreateCapability
    This class is used to create a new capability to be issued to a client.
    HashingAlgo  
    HCAPAuthorizationServer
    This class contains all the necessary operations to configure and start the authorization server.
    HCAPProcessExchange
    This class is used to process a CoAP exchange which has been received at endpoint.
    HCAPRequestHandler
    This class is used ton handle different type of requests which arrive at the authorization server, the request could be to issue a capability or update the state.
    jsonConverter
    This class is used for encoding some data as CBOR and vice versa.
    ManageUsers
    This class manages the user's session for the users part of the protocol.
    States
    This class is used as a data structure to store the stationary and transitioning permission for a state.
    StateTransitions
    This class is used as a data structure to store the transitions originating from a particular state.
    verifyHash
